query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'kpi_alert_stats';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'kpi_alert_stats';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
date	timestamp
production_line_id	int
production_line_name	varchar
alert_type	varchar
alert_count	int
avg_value	decimal
min_value	decimal
max_value	decimal
created_at	timestamp
